body:
So,

This is the end, I had such a good time here. I met so much friends and had so much fun.

I started here, was afraid to talk to ppl. Now i am the co owner of a discord that everyone here knows ''Average Working Place''. I want to thank two people in special.

First propably my best friend, PowerPixel. We had so much fun together. And made a special band

Second Coco, co owner with me. We had so much fun and u teached me a lot.

To top it all of, i want to thank people like Jaystah, Panda, Wolfi, Lokigh, Minertedtoad, Atdit and a lot more peeps.

I hope y'all learned some dutch.

I wish you all a good life. 

Goodbye Mels

title: Goodbye.

replies.body: bye mels, we had some good times on cth and such back in the day, have a good life.
replies.body_tagged: bye mels, we had some good times on cth and such back in the day, have a good life.

replies.body:
Oh Mels, I will always have a place for you and will remember the memes and hope that I continue to see you!
Ik zal je altijd missen, mijn vriend, en speel Minecraft!
replies.body_tagged:
Oh Mels, I will always have a place for you and will remember the memes and hope that I continue to see you!
Ik zal je altijd missen, mijn vriend, en speel Minecraft!

replies.body:
Mels daddy, when I first saw you on avicus you annoyed me because you were the kid that got iron armour and that made me rage sooo hard. But when we started to talk in voice chat ( when you joined Xenarch (REEEE)) I realised: HEYY THIS IS A NICE LIL KIDDO, and from then on I've seen you as one of my best and funniest friends. I can't say how much fun I had with you because I just had too much that words can't explain. The amount of times I laughed with you were more times than minertedtoad applied for mod, more times than ALM used /disguise in game, I've laughed more times with you than we have listened to September. I don't see you as a block man I met playing mine and craft but I see you as a best friend and a daddy. The memories I had with you and the TEAMWORRK we had together will be remembered forever and I wish you a lifetime of happiness in your vast future. If I come to the Netherlands I'll give you a call *wink* *wink*.

Goodbye my friend and I will remember you for the rest of my life.

Thank you for being my friend and I would just like to say one last thing to you:

Whenever it's September I will always, always think of you.

Goodbye Mels, have a good life.

From your Son: Power_Pixel68

PS: MAY do a face reveal.

replies.body:
Mels <3,

Since the little group chat that we used to have that developed into AWP with more then 100 members.

You've brought great memes and laughs to the community and we will miss you loads, with one less owner of Average workplace  its gonna be harder to get around life XD, i will keep learning dutch (ik ben coco vee ben yey0 idk if thats right xD gl in life kido <3 bye

-coco
